name: Return the SEPA Direct Debits in UBS format for an NSC and Account

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000935430811000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I search for SEPA Direct Debits in UBS format on the following Account:
| nsc | account |
| 932361 | 07555144 |

children.description: Get UBS sepa direct debits transactions: aib.oneview.ui.model.account.SepaDirectDebitUBSListRequest@1726923c

testSteps.description: Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following SEPA Direct Debits in UBS format should be returned
